description:
A mesh composed of triangles.
The triangles are defined by triplets of indices into a vertex list.
Optionally, parts and edges can be defined.

edges.description: An optional structure defining edges and edge chunks of the mesh.
A structure defining edges and edge chunks of the mesh.

indices.description: Edges defined by tuples of indices into the vertex list. Columns: start, end

parts.description: An optional structure defining edge chunks the mesh is composed of.

edge_parts.description: A structure defining edge chunks of the mesh.

allOf.description: Attributes associated with each edge chunk.

chunks.description:
A tuple defining the first index and the length of a chunk.
The chunk refers to a segment of the edges array.
Chunks do not have to include all edges, and chunks can overlap.
Columns: offset, count
